apiKeys.description: Generate API keys for automated integrations and service-to-service communication.

adminRequired.title: Administrator access required
adminRequired.description: Only administrators can create or manage API keys. Contact your system administrator if you need access.

table.title: API keys
table.description: Each API key can optionally impersonate a user to mirror their permissions.
table.empty: No API keys have been created yet.

create.title: Create API key
create.description: Define a display name, optional impersonation target, and expiration date.
create.impersonateDescription: Requests authenticated with this key will run with the impersonated user's permissions.
create.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe how this key will be used
create.error: We couldn't create the API key. Please try again.
create.secretDescription: This secret is shown only once. Store it securely before closing this window.
create.secretWarning: Share this secret only with trusted services. Anyone with this key can perform actions on your behalf.

revoke.label: Disable
revoke.confirmDescription: Requests using {{name}} will stop working immediately.
revoke.error: We couldn't disable the API key. Please try again.

spec.title: API reference
spec.description: Download the OpenAPI specification that documents the available REST endpoints.
spec.loadError: We couldn't load the API specification. Refresh to try again.

messages.defaultError: An error occurred during addon registration
messages.invalidConfiguration: No addon registry found for system {{systemAddress}}

messages.createdBootstrapFailed: System created at {{systemAddress}} but bootstrap failed. Manual intervention may be required.
